name: Duality: Buried Pain
description:
A man whose mind dwells in the past. What is it that keeps him there? Two mysterious women. What is the meaning of their presence in his home? Duality: Buried Pain is an upcoming horror game by us at GamersBCZ. This is a very very short demo that we believe will wet your appetite for the full game.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move,

Z/Enter is to interact with objects and the menu.

X/Escape is to open up the menu and to exit the menu.

I tried to make it playable on a browser, but I was unable to. I will be adding the full credits in the description when all of my team gets back to me, but since by the time I wake up, the submission time will be over, I have to submit it now.
